text: Longetia is a genus of plants under the family Picrodendraceae first described as a genus in 1866. It has only one known species, Longetia buxoides, endemic to New Caledonia. ;formerly included moved to other genera: Austrobuxus Scagea ==See also== *Taxonomy of the Picrodendraceae ==References== Category:Picrodendraceae Category:Monotypic Malpighiales genera Category:Endemic flora of New Caledonia Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon
title: Longetia
